name: Breakong
description:
A short experiment created utilizing the OkapiKit for the April 2023 Edition of the Game Creator's Club.

The game is a 2 Player co-op version of Breakout reminiscing of the classic Pong.

Controls:

  • W/S - Up/Down for Left Player
  • Up Arrow/Down Arrow - Up/Down for Right Player
  • Space - Shoots the ball. Can be used to reset the angle it is currently traveling at.
